root.title: ccc accept bonu bid semolina egypt
root.body: commod credit corpor ccc accept bid export bonu cover sale 2,000 tonn semolina egypt u.s. agricultur depart sai depart sai bonu 233.91 dlr per tonn make intern multifood corp bonu will pai form commod ccc stock semolina shipment june 1987 sai addit 13,000 tonn semolina still avail egypt export enhanc program initi announc august 6 1986 sai
